long_description: You train hard so make it count with a PowerBar ProteinPlus(R) bar. ProteinPlus bars are a great choice after training or competition where protein intake can help support muscle rebuilding and recovery. TriSource(TM) protein, a proprietary blend of whey, soy and casein proteins, helps build lean muscle and provides sustained energy for active people. Each bar contains 20g of TriSource protein. No preservatives or artificial flavors. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: You train hard so make it count with a PowerBar ProteinPlus(R) bar.
